Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
control.appointment.AppointmentController
public class AppointmentController extends Object
Controller for managing appointments

  • Method Details

    • scheduleAppointment

      public static void scheduleAppointment(Doctor doc, Patient patient, Appointment.Service service, LocalDateTime selectedSlot) throws InvalidInputException
      Schedules a new appointment.
      Parameters:
      doc - The doctor for the appointment.
      patient - The patient for the appointment.
      service - The service type of the appointment.
      selectedSlot - The date and time for the appointment.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If any of the parameters are null.

    • getAppt

      public static Appointment getAppt(String apptId) throws InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Retrieves an appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      apptId - The ID of the appointment.
      Returns:
      The appointment object.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the ID is null or empty.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the appointment is not found.

    • getAllAppts

      public static List<Appointment> getAllAppts()
      Retrieves all appointments.
      Returns:
      A list of all appointments.

    • getDoctorAppts

      public static List<Appointment> getDoctorAppts(Doctor doc) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves all appointments for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doc - The doctor whose appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments for the specified doctor.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the doctor is null.

    • getPendingAppts

      public static List<Appointment> getPendingAppts(Doctor doc) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves all pending appointments for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doc - The doctor whose pending appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of pending appointments for the specified doctor.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the doctor is null.

    • getScheduledAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> getScheduledAppointments(Patient patient) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves all scheduled future appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient whose scheduled appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of scheduled appointments for the specified patient.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the patient is null.

    • getPastAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> getPastAppointments(Patient patient) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves all past appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient whose past appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of past appointments for the specified patient.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the patient is null.

    • getAppointmentOutcomes

      public static List<Object> getAppointmentOutcomes(Patient patient) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves the outcomes of completed appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient whose appointment outcomes are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list containing past appointments, prescriptions, and prescription items.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the patient is null.

    • getAvailableTimeSlots

      public static List<LocalDateTime> getAvailableTimeSlots(HospitalStaff doc, LocalDate date) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves available time slots for a given hospital staff (doctor) on a specific date. The method checks the default time slots and filters out the unavailable ones based on the existing unavailability records for the doctor on the specified date.
      Parameters:
      doc - The hospital staff (doctor) for whom the available time slots are to be retrieved.
      date - The date for which to retrieve available time slots.
      Returns:
      A list of available time slots as LocalDateTime objects.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If either the doc or date is null.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public static void rescheduleAppointment(Appointment appt, LocalDateTime newDateTime) throws InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Reschedules an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      appt - The appointment to be rescheduled.
      newDateTime - The new date and time for the appointment.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the appointment or new date/time is null.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the doctor is not found or the time slot is unavailable.

    • apptRequestDecision

      public static void apptRequestDecision(Appointment appt, boolean isAccepted) throws InvalidInputException
      Makes a decision on an appointment request.
      Parameters:
      appt - The appointment request to be decided.
      isAccepted - True if the appointment is accepted, false if it is rejected.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the appointment is null or already confirmed/canceled.

    • completeAppointment

      public static void completeAppointment(Appointment appt, String diagnosis, String consultationNotes) throws InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Completes an appointment by setting its diagnosis, consultation notes, and prescribed medication.
      Parameters:
      appt - The appointment to be completed.
      diagnosis - The diagnosis for the appointment.
      consultationNotes - The consultation notes.
      prescribedMedication - The prescribed medication details.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If any required input is null or empty.
      EntityNotFoundException - If prescription creation fails.

    • cancelAppointment

      public static void cancelAppointment(Appointment appt) throws InvalidInputException
      Cancels an appointment.
      Parameters:
      appt - The appointment to be canceled.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the appointment is null.

    • checkOverlappingAppointments

      public static boolean checkOverlappingAppointments(Doctor doc, LocalDateTime dateTime) throws InvalidInputException
      Checks if there are any overlapping appointments for a doctor at a given date and time.
      Parameters:
      doc - The doctor to check for overlapping appointments.
      dateTime - The date and time to check.
      Returns:
      True if there is an overlapping appointment, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the doctor or date/time is null.

    • getApptByDate

      public static List<Appointment> getApptByDate(Doctor doc, LocalDate date) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves appointments for a specific doctor on a given date.
      Parameters:
      doc - The doctor whose appointments are to be retrieved.
      date - The date for which to retrieve appointments.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments for the specified doctor on the given date.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the doctor or date is null.

    • getDoctorsPatients

      public static List<Patient> getDoctorsPatients(Doctor doc) throws InvalidInputException
      Retrieves a list of unique patients assigned to a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doc - The doctor whose patients are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of unique patients assigned to the specified doctor.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the doctor is null.

    • updateAppointmentOutcomes

      public static void updateAppointmentOutcomes(Appointment appt, String updatedDiagnosis, String updatedConsultationNotes) throws InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Updates the outcomes of a completed appointment, including diagnosis, prescriptions, and consultation notes.
      Parameters:
      appt - The appointment to be updated.
      updatedDiagnosis - The updated diagnosis, or null if no update is required.
      updatedConsultationNotes - The updated consultation notes, or null if no update is required.
      updatedPrescribedMedication - The updated prescribed medications (key: medicine ID, value: list [quantity, notes]), or null if no update is required.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the appointment is null or not completed, or if input values are invalid.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the prescription or prescription items cannot be updated.
